title: An Alchemic Clark Bar of Delight
description: Judge Hodgman tells us what's wrong and what's right! Is ice cream actually "candy"? Should you go to your mom's 60th birthday party? Is it ok to leave used snot rags lying around?
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
